tasks: Many exercise books, much milk, much water, many days, many newspapers, much chalk, much snow, many years,  many pictures,  much  music,  many boys,  many girls, much tea, many lemons, much meat, many rooms, many  teachers,  much  work,  much  air,  many  birds, many cars
